input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Smoking has a direct effect on effort and lactose intolerance. Effort has a direct effect on lactose intolerance. We know that smoking causes being hard-working. smoking or being hard-working causes being lactose intolerant. Would the student is lactose intolerant if nonsmoking instead of smoking?
